title: Is This Soldier Carrying a Donkey to Keep It Out of a Minefield?
subtitle: Caption: "During difficult times the first ones you have to keep under control are the jackasses who don't understand the danger and do as they please."
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A photograph shows a soldier carrying a donkey on his back during World War II to prevent the animal from inadvertently setting off landmines.
